title: Priyanka Chopra says she 'really can't wait' to start a family with husband Nick Jonas
text:
Priyanka Chopra wed her husband Nick Jonas nearly one year ago.

And The Sky is Pink actress revealed during a Today show interview on Tuesday that the two already want to have children.

'I can't wait. I really can't wait,' the 37-year-old Quantico actress gushed to host and interviewer Hoda Kotb.

Babies on the brain: Priyanka Chopra revealed on Tuesday that she 'really can't wait' to start a family with husband of nearly one-year, Nick Jonas

'I mean there's so much that happens in our lives that whenever God blesses us with that it's something that we both definitely want,' said the siren

Priyanka told People back in March that while they were excited for children, it may not happen in the near future.

That is due to their current incredibly hectic schedules.

Exciting times: 'I can't wait. I really can't wait,' she gushed to host and interviewer Hoda Kotb

'We both know that that's something that needs to happen, but it's not something I think about very much,' she said at the time regarding starting her family.

'We’re both very driven, we love our work, we’re married to our work, and we’re both very supportive of each other’s work. So I’m sure it will happen in an organic way.'

And it's not the first time the Isn't It Romantic star has addressed expanding her family with Nick Jonas.

All in good times: 'I always say, "Man proposes, God disposes." So I’m not taking any chances,' she told People

Busy lives: 'I mean there's so much that happens in our lives that whenever God blesses us with that it's something that we both definitely want'

Big day: And the New York City press day continued for the beauty who was later seen making an appearance on The View

Just days after her wedding she said she was just taking each day as it came.

'I always say, "Man proposes, God disposes." So I’m not taking any chances,' she told People.

'We definitely want kids, and when the time is right, it will happen.'

Priyanka stunned in a gorgeous Markarian floral satin skirt and top combo retailing for a total of $1500 for the short appearance.

Gorgeous: Priyanka stunned in a mint colored velour maxi-length dress that was cinched in at the waist

And the New York City press day continued for the beauty who was later seen making an appearance on The View.

Priyanka stunned in a mint colored velour maxi-length dress that was cinched in at the waist.

She teamed the look with a pair of pointed toe snakeskin shoes and oval shaped white shades.

The new Jonas family member carried a matching purse and completed her glam look with a bold red lip.

The Sky Is Pink will be released in cinemas on Friday October 11.
description: Priyanka Chopra revealed on Tuesday that she 'really can't wait' to start a family with husband of nearly one-year, Nick Jonas. The beauty shared the exciting hopes while appearing on GMA.
